Total length mismatch: 1.27 mm
GND shielding
GND shielding to adjacent signals (especially high speed IO) is recommended.
Number of vias allowed
Max 2 vias - recommended to minimize number of vias.
Reference plane
Continuous GND only; do not reference to power planes.
If routed as stripline or dual stripline, both top and bottom reference/ adjacent planes MUST be solid continuous ground.
External capacitor values
External capacitors C1 and C2 must be matched (C1 = C2).
Capacitor values should be tuned according to load capacitance of RTC Crystal.
If the crystal load capacitance reduces ( per data sheet information), C1/C2 value should be reduced as well.
For example if load capacitance is close to 10pF, more optimized C1/C2 value would be closer to 10 pF (instead of 14 pF).
Due to vendor variation in crystal characteristics, layout variation and PCB trace, calculation is recommended to determine C1/C2 Values.
Main route (MR)
Main route (MR) is recommended to be limited to SL/ DSL to limit coupling and impact from EMI/ RFI sources.
